best_bets.explanation: Bolted in her first two starts and was a 'good thing beaten' last time – clearly the standout of the day.
Flying this prep with two strong wins on the trot; looks well placed to notch up a third straight victory.
Undefeated filly who has won both starts with ease; should justify the short quote as the best of the day in Brisbane.

value_bets.explanation: Nine-year-old outsider who could surprise at huge odds if he finds his best – a genuine knockout hope.
Quality mare resuming off a big win last prep; at around $19 she represents great each-way value in an open race.
Has been threatening to win another race and brings solid NSW form – worth a play at double-figure odds.
